mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.u_name as author_name FROM lost_found_animals a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.u_id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.*, u.u_name AS author_name, (SELECT af.file_path FROM attachment_file af WHERE af.board_id = a.id AND af.board_type = 'lostfound' ORDER BY af.id ASC LIMIT 1) AS thumbnail_file_name FROM lost_found_animals a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.u_id ORDER BY a.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lost_found_animals (user_id, board_type, title, content, animal_type, gender, age, location, event_date, contact_name, contact_phone, contact_email, view_count, like_count) VALUES (#{userId}, #{boardType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{animalType}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{location}, #{eventDate}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE lost_found_animals SET board_type=#{boardType}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, animal_type=#{animalType}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, location=#{location}, event_date=#{eventDate}, contact_name=#{contactName}, contact_phone=#{contactPhone}, contact_email=#{contactEmail}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE lost_found_animals SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachment_file (board_type, board_id, file_name, file_path, file_type, file_size) VALUES (#{boardType}, #{boardId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT id, board_type, board_id, file_name, file_path, file_size, file_type FROM attachment_file WHERE board_type = 'lostfound' AND board_id = #{animalId} ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM attachment_file WHERE board_id = #{animalId} AND board_type = 'lostfound'
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id, u.u_name as author_name, a.board_type, a.title, a.content, a.animal_type, a.gender, a.age, a.location, a.event_date, a.contact_name, a.contact_phone, a.contact_email, a.view_count, a.like_count, a.created_at, a.updated_at, (SELECT af.file_path FROM attachment_file af WHERE af.board_id = a.id AND af.board_type = 'lostfound' ORDER BY af.id ASC LIMIT 1) AS thumbnail_file_name FROM lost_found_animals a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.u_id ORDER BY a.created_at DESC, a.id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
